amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 118-158 to transfer $3 million from NATO's Security Investment Program to the Spending Reduction Account at the end of the bill.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce by $3 million the NATO Security Investment Program and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 99 - 327 (Roll no. 370).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Ogles.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 99 - 327 (Roll no. 370).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
